#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
class deepak
{
    public:
        long long n,sm;
        long long cal();
        void display(long long );
};
long long deepak::cal()
{
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    sm=(n/2)*(n/2+1);
    if(n%2==0)
        sm=sm-n/2;
    return sm;
}
void deepak::display(long long p)
{
    printf("%lld\n",p);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    deepak pooja;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long ans=pooja.cal();
        pooja.display(ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
